name: Defeating Claudius
description:
Instructions

The keyboard is mightier than the sword! Slay Claudius with your roaring powers by just spelling names or quotes used in Shakespeare’s “Hamlet”.

Claudius is preying on the kinghood of Denmark after the sudden death of his brother, King Hamlet. Step into Young Hamlet’s boots and protect Denmark against this scoundrel by spelling various names of characters used in Shakespeare’s play or by tapping away famous quotes used by Young Hamlet himself. Only this way will you prevent the many Claudiuses from entering Denmark’s royal castle and stealing the crown!

Note: exclamation marks, question marks, apostrophes and spaces ought not to be written.
